subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Anna Chakvetadze and Svetlana Kuznetsova won the singles matches Saturday in Moscow to give Russia a 2-0 lead over the United States in the semifinals of the Fed Cup.
snippet: Anna Chakvetadze and Svetlana Kuznetsova won the singles matches Saturday in Moscow to give Russia a 2-0 lead over the United States in the semifinals of the Fed Cup.
